A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Episode 8 suffers from poorly written characters\, an unhealthy obsession with subverting expectations\, unsatisfying conclusions and answers\, and a boring plot riddled with holes. The only real benefit is it's visuals (excluding the fight scenes\, which are poorly thought out and choreographed). All in all\, The Last Jedi is a missed opportunity to tell a deeper and darker story.
